name: Barntime
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Barn Time is a multi-media podcast filmed in one-take, broadcasting live out of a backyard barn. We strive to bring diverse creative people together to collaborate and support each other. Barn Time aims to connect community while being an honest voice. We facilitate productive conversations about the human experience through the performing arts. We enjoy talking about everything from our local scale to the orbiting globe and beyond
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
